title: Jobs | NYU Langone Health
cleaned_text: Our Culture Our mission - to serve, teach, and discover - is achieved 365 days a year through a diverse and inclusive culture devoted to excellence across the entire organization. Featured Jobs Working In NYC New York City isn't just an exciting place to live and work - it's a way of life and part of the fabric of NYU Langone. New Yorkers expect the best of everything-the best food, the best culture, the best healthcare. And that's what a career at NYU Langone means: delivering best-in-class care to the vibrant community that we serve.
